body.name: 27 PCS Stationary Writing Paper with Envelopes Set Cute Vintage Floral Letter Writing and Stationery Paper Envelopes（18 Sheets with 9 Envelopes）
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 20 hrs 12 mins
features: Unique Stationery Paper and Envelope Set: This stationery set is suitable for those who like handwritten letters, expressing your sincere feelings and cordial greetings to your friends.

Quality Stationery: Double-sided floral letter design and printable stationery writing paper, which is compatible with printers, fountain pens or gel pens. Stationary with lines makes it easy to mark the content of each line to express your wishes.
Easy to Use: Our stationery set for writing letters comes with sealing glue. Fold the letter paper, put into the envelope, seal it, and then you can send it out. It is easy to send a letter.

Size Information: The size of letter paper is: 8.3 x 5.7in, the size of envelope is: 3.5 x 6.7in, the retro and exquisite floral letter design is suitable for writing to your pen pal, family or friends.

Individually Wrapped: Every two pieces of letter paper are matched with an envelope, and each set contains 4 sheets and it us individually wrapped to keep the letter paper neat and tidy. Small and cute, the stationery set for women is suitable for stuffing in gifts.
body.description: The cute retro envelope and stationery set is an ideal choice for you to write letters to your friends, which can deepen the connection with your friends. Vivid printing and fashionable patterns will leave a deep impression on you and your letter recipients. It is suitable for writing letters to pen pals, friends, family members, or stuffing them in gifts to express their feelings. Paper size: 8.3" x 5.7" Envelope size: 3.5" x 6.7" Weight of a single set of letter: 0.32 ounces / 9.2g Package includes: 18 sheets writing paper + 9 envelopes How to use: Step 1: Finish the letter writing Step 2: Fold the stationery Step 3: Put it into the envelope Step 4: Seal it with glue Step 5: Post stamps and mail

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice set
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my grandma and she loved it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Granddaughter Loved It!
reviews.reviewText: I remember having these sets of stationary when I was younger. My granddaughters have started mailing letters to me and I surprised them with these sets. They were super excited. Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Very nice and feminine. Fast delivery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars "27 Pieces" is a bit deceitful, but still good balue
reviews.reviewText: The number 27 makes it sound more impressive than it is, but the kit itself contains such beautiful pieces that I quickly got over that. It's definitely a "light and airy" and feminine stationary set, so I used my first 2 to write letters to my mom and my MIL. 🥰

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gave as gift
reviews.reviewText: Gave as gift to an avid letter writer. She loved it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The paper looks so faded and dull. One of the sets has “good luck” written all over it. Not once, in the description, does it say that it says that. I was a little disappointed but what do I expect for 6.99? I will use it and it will serve its purpose. It’s kind of pretty so there ya go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow so Much
reviews.reviewText: This a great value, you get so much and for not a lot of money, such cute patterns , this us a bargain
